<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Legs of Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=1230) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Golem Grafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=39)

**Prerequisites**
[Golem Grafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1227)

</column>

---

You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) you. You can Shove creatures even if you don’t have a hand free. When you successfully Shove a foe, you can Stride away from your opponent (instead of toward it), but you must move the same distance in the opposite direction from where you Shoved it.
name: Legs of Stone
